name: Flying Saucer Attack
overview: You are defending the Oasis Beer Garden from UFOs. Score points by shooting them with ball lightning. The saucers drop small particles of antimatter. One hit will annihilate the whole the whole place, beer and all. Move left and right by using the cursor keys at the bottom-right. Good luck! Developed by Larry Fast and published by Reston Publishing as a type-in from his book "25 Advanced Games for the Commodore 64"
